item.title: About frtech.dev
item.description: FRTech.dev is a personal blog about Cloud and DevOps. I will post the things I’m learning, for instance, how-to tutorials, step by step procedures and tech related news. The goal is to keep track of what I’m learning and share my knowledge. Enjoy and feel free to reach me out on twitter @FernandoRolnik
